# init(strokes:)

**Initializer**

Creates a drawing object with the strokes you supply.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(strokes: [PKStroke])
```

## Parameters

- **strokes**: An array of [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKStrokeReference] elements.

## Creating a drawing object

- **init(data:)**: Creates a drawing object and populates it with previously drawn content.
- **init()**: Creates an empty drawing object.
